name: Adrift (Walter-H)
description:
Survive in the depths of uncharted space!
Your spaceship has suffered damage and you need to fly yourself back to safety! 

Use your instruments to mine neutronium to jump from system to system and fight off annoying enemies!

Neutronium can be collected by shooting blue-tinted asteroids.

Targeting doesn't do much at the moment, but the fire button works just fine. :P
